Class MainFrame

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
pl.gda.pg.elektronikaodpodstaw.main.MainFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible, RootPaneContainer, WindowConstants
public class MainFrame extends JFrame
Entry point of the game. It initializes the application's configuration, manages the main window, and handles the navigation between different panels, such as the main menu, level selection, and settings.
See Also:

      public MainFrame()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method serves as the entry point of the application. It initializes and displays the main application window.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used).

    • showTheory

      public static void showTheory(MainFrame frame, String theory)
      Displays theoretical information for a given level.
      Parameters:
      frame - the main application frame.
      theory - the theory content to display.

    • showQuestion

      public static void showQuestion(MainFrame frame, String question)
      Displays question or task to do for a given level.
      Parameters:
      frame - the main application frame.
      question - the question content to display.

    • getScrollPlane

      public static JScrollPane getScrollPlane(String content, boolean isQuestion)
      Creates a scrollable pane for displaying content.
      Parameters:
      content - the content to display.
      isQuestion - information whether the content is a question or theory in order to create the appropriate size of ScrollPlane
      Returns:
      a JScrollPane containing the formatted content.

    • getEquationTheme

      public static String getEquationTheme()
      Returns the color in the form of a String which is needed for equations.
      Returns:
      a string representing color.

    • getTextTheme

      public static Color getTextTheme()
      Retrieves the text color based on the current theme.
      Returns:
      the text color.

    • getBackgroundTheme

      public static Color getBackgroundTheme()
      Retrieves the background color based on the current theme.
      Returns:
      the background color.

    • startSettings

      private void startSettings()
      Initializes application settings. If the configuration file is broken, default settings are applied.

    • loadConfig

      private void loadConfig()
      Loads the application configuration from the config manager. Initializes settings like available level, current theme, current resistor symbol.
